verses.text: ‘I HE taimi ko ia ‘e fakaava ha matavai ki he fale ‘o Tēvita, mo e nofo Selusalema, ki he angahala mo e fakalielia.

Pea ka hoko ‘a e taimi ko ia–ko Sihova Sāpaoti eni mei he Ta‘ehāmai–te u tu‘usi ‘a e ngaahi hingoa ‘o e ngaahi ‘aitoli mei he fonua, pea ‘e ‘ikai kei manatua kinautolu; pea te u ‘ai ke hiki mei he fonua ‘a e kau palōfita mo e laumālie ta‘ema‘a.

Pea ka ‘iloange ‘e toe fai ha palofisai ‘e ha taha, ‘e lea ki ai ‘e he‘ene tamai mo ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘a e ongo me‘a na‘e fanau‘i ia, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai totonu ke ke mo‘ui; he kuo ke lea loi ‘i he huafa ‘o Sihova; pea ko ‘ene tamai mo ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘a e ongo me‘a na‘e fanau‘i ia, te na tui‘i ia ‘i he‘ene fai palofisai.
Pea ka hoko ‘a e taimi ko ia, ‘e maa‘i ‘a e palōfita takitaha ‘ene vīsone ‘i he‘ene fai palofisai; pea ‘e ‘ikai te nau ‘ai ha kofu fulufulua ke kākā.
Ka te ne pehē, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko e palōfita au: ko e motu‘a fa‘a au: he na‘e fakatau au ‘e ha tangata ‘i he‘eku talavou, ‘o talu ai pē.
Pea kapau ‘e pehē ‘e ha taha kiate ia, Ko e hā tū ‘a e ngaahi lavea na ‘i he vaha‘a ‘o ho ongo nima, te ne tali, Ko hoku taa‘i ia ‘i he fale ‘o hoku kau ‘ofa‘anga.
Heletā ē, ofo hake ke fai mo hoku tauhi, pea ki he helo ko hoto takaua–ko Sihova Sāpaoti ia mei he Ta‘ehāmai–taa‘i ‘a e tauhi, kae movete ‘a e tākanga; pea ‘e toe ala hoku nima ki he fanga ‘uhiki.
Pea ‘e hoko ‘o pehē ‘i he fonua kotoa–ko Sihova ia mei he ta‘ehāmai–ko hono vahe ‘e ua ‘e tu‘usi ‘o mate; ka ko hono vahetolu ‘e toe ai.

Pea ko hono vahetolu ko ia, te u fakahū ki he afi, pea te u fakama‘a kinautolu hangē ko e fakama‘a siliva; pea te u sivi kinautolu, hangē ko e sivi ‘o e koula: ‘e tautapa ia ki hoku hingoa, pea te u tali ia ‘e au; te u pehē, Ko hoku kakai ia; pea ‘e pehē ‘e ia, Ko Sihova ko hoku ‘Otua.
